title: Western Australian Team
body:
Are you almost level 30? Or have you just hit level 30 and are looking for a team? Do you live in Western Australia? If your answer is yes to all these questions, add me on league of legends, as I am hoping to form a team of dedicated players, schedule will be a few hours Monday, Wednesday, Thursday, Friday nights and a few games Saturday and Sunday 
Roles that I am looking for are:
Jungle, ADC, and Support 
I generally play Top and occasionally support, I already have a player lined up for mid. 
If you are interested please add myself Otitis or Koharuai

replies.body: Hi there are you still looking for an ADC?
cheers for adding me, and look forward to having a good team

I main jg, I work during the day but am usually free to play after 6pm most nights of the year.
How does that sound?
that sounds exellent, I've added you
